transform_def.name: disc2strip
transform_def.string: let scale = dot(p_in, p_in) rin = p_in * scale r_factor = exp(log(dot(rin, rin)) * power) theta = atan2(rin.y, rin.x) phi = theta - pi() * floor(theta / pi()) phi2 = if phi > halfpi() then phi - pi() else phi amp = (1 / cos(phi2)) * weight * r_factor in rin * amp
